survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of professional development training programs provided to employees, focusing on relevance, engagement, and practical application.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the professional development training programs offered by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced and avoids bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the professional development training programs offered by your organization?

questions.question_text: Which of the following professional development training programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: Which of the following professional development training programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How relevant were the training programs to your current role?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure relevance. Ensure the question is clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How relevant were the training programs to your current role?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to make the professional development training programs more effective?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to make the professional development training programs more effective?

questions.question_text: How often does your organization offer professional development training programs?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear frequency options. Include an option for rare or no training.

script.question_text: How often does your organization offer professional development training programs?

questions.question_text: To what extent have the training programs helped you improve your job performance?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure impact on performance. Avoid leading questions.

script.question_text: To what extent have the training programs helped you improve your job performance?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2

questions.question_text: Which format do you prefer for professional development training? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: Which format do you prefer for professional development training? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How engaged did you feel during the training sessions?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure engagement. Ensure the scale is intuitive.

script.question_text: How engaged did you feel during the training sessions?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in professional development training?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in professional development training?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the professional development training programs to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. This question measures net promoter score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the professional development training programs to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
